name: Liberator (Virtual Nomad)
description:
Liberate villages besieged by swarming invaders

2D Top-Down Tanks for Bullet Hell Jam 2022

Controls & Gameplay:
  • [A|D] = Left|Right    |   [Mouse] = Aim   |   [LMB] = Pause
  • Villages get progressively more difficult
  • If Kills = 10 then INC Wave  :  If Wave  > 5 then INC Village
  • Kills within 5 secs of each other earn Combo Bonus
  • Local high score saved
  • Friendly fire is your friend
  • Driving in a straight line is not

I will continue this project, post-jam. please leave feedback and share ideas for it @ the TGC forum thread: https://forum.thegamecreators.com/thread/228429
